word: This is the work to be done today. We have a message to give to the people. . . . Christ declares, “I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst. . . . All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.”—Australasian Union Conference Record, Jan. 1, 1900.
